main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright circular object emitting a brilliant white light hovering in the sky near Minnesota on the night of 8 October 1965.
interesting points: The object was hovering approximately 500 feet above the ground and 2 miles away from the observer., The light from the object illuminated the area surrounding the observer's vehicle., The object changed color from white to reddish-orange before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 10 to 15 minutes., The observer was initially driving home from work at the Green Giant Cannery when the sighting occurred.
sighted object: a circular object emitting a bright light
witness description: a civilian employee of the Green Giant Cannery
